        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getTextureRegionByTextureEnum(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tileSet,
                                                                                        TextureEnum itemEnum)
        This function gets the texture region from the texture enumeration.
        Parameters:
        tileSet - The tileset texture to be divided into a region.
        itemEnum - The texture enum of the texture you are trying to get.
        Returns:
        TextureRegion To be used to render on the screen.

        This function gets the texture region from the id of the sprite.
        Parameters:
        tileSet - The tileset texture to be divided into a region.
